mapper.select:

) D ORDER BY D.P_IDX ASC ) DD ORDER BY NUM DESC limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT P_IDX, S_DATE, E_DATE, P_WIDTH, P_HEIGHT, P_LEFT, P_TOP, TITLE, CONTENT, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_DATE, FILECLASS FROM TB_POPUP P WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND P_IDX = #{pIdx}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_POPUP ( P_IDX, S_DATE, E_DATE, P_WIDTH, P_HEIGHT, P_LEFT, P_TOP, TITLE, CONTENT, FILECLASS, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_DATE, REG_IP ) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CONVERT(P_IDX, UNSIGNED)), 0)+1 AS P_IDX FROM TB_POPUP P), #{sDate}, #{eDate}, #{pWidth}, #{pHeight}, #{pLeft}, #{pTop}, #{title}, #{content}, #{fileclass}, 'Y', #{session.id}, #{session.name}, now(), #{remoteAddr} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_POPUP SET S_DATE = #{sDate}, E_DATE = #{eDate}, P_WIDTH = #{pWidth}, P_HEIGHT = #{pHeight}, P_LEFT = #{pLeft}, FILECLASS = #{fileclass}, P_TOP = #{pTop}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, MOD_ID = #{session.id}, MOD_NAME = #{session.name}, MOD_DATE = now(), MOD_IP = #{remoteAddr} WHERE P_IDX = #{pIdx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TB_POPUP SET USE_YN = 'N', MOD_ID = #{session.id}, MOD_NAME = #{session.name}, MOD_DATE = now(), MOD_IP = #{remoteAddr} WHERE P_IDX = #{pIdx}
